error400.title: Red Hat | 400
error400.header: This is really embarrassing, but something unplanned happened

error401.title: Red Hat | 401
error401.message: 401: You are unauthorized to view this page.

error404.title: Red Hat | 404
error404.message: 404: The resource your requested is not available.

error500.title: Red Hat | 500
error500.message: 500: We're having an internal server error. Please try again in a few minutes.

error504.title: Red Hat | 504
error504.message: 504: The service is overloaded at the moment. Please try again in a few minutes.

BrowserNotSupported.title: Red Hat | Browser Not Supported
BrowserNotSupported.message: To use the system, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome, Firefox or Safari.

YourCookiesAreDisabled.title: Red Hat | Your Cookies Are Disabled
YourCookiesAreDisabled.message: Your cookies are disabled on your browser. Turn on them and retry.

FactoryWorkspaceCreationFailed.title: Red Hat | Oops, Something Went Wrong
FactoryWorkspaceCreationFailed.message:
We are unable to create a workspace dedicated to the factory URL you clicked on. Sorry for inconvenience.

Please try again or contact support.

WorkspaceDoesNotExist.title: Red Hat | Workspace Does Not Exist
WorkspaceDoesNotExist.message: Please, make sure you entered a correct workspace name or proceed to User Dashboard

AccessRequiresLicenseAcceptance.title: Red Hat | Access Requires License Acceptance
AccessRequiresLicenseAcceptance.message: Your admin has not accepted the license agreement.

NoAccountFound.title: Red Hat | No Account Found
NoAccountFound.message:
Looks like you tried to log in with oAuth, but we could not find an account for you.

Self-service account creation is disabled.

Please contact your administrator to have an account created.

WebsocketConnectionError.title: Red Hat | Websocket Connection Error
WebsocketConnectionError.message:
We are getting network errors with Web Sockets. Web Sockets are a fundamental part of our communications. These errors are usually caused by firewalls. Please contact your system administrators for more information.

Test your connection here.

Maintenance.title: Red Hat | System Maintenance
Maintenance.message: The system is undergoing maintenance and will be available shortly.
